markings: verso BL, graphite: "Bather Washing Her Hair"; verso BR, barely legible, in graphite: woman washing / her hair; Eric Firestore gallery label on back of frame at TL
text: A woman sitting in a bathing tub, bathing in the center of the watercolor. She is shampooing her hair, not looking at the viewer. There is a razor blade and shaving cream on the tub’s ledge. There is a razor blade and shaving cream on the tub’s ledge which divides the paper. The silver bathroom tiles fill the top half of the artwork.
title: Bather Washing Her Hair
